mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMMENT (ANO, CONTENT, WRITER, REG_IP, WDATE) VALUES (#{ano},#{content},#{writer},#{reg_ip},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select C.*, U.nick from TB_COMMENT C JOIN TB_USER U ON C.WRITER = U.USID where ano=#{ano}
mapper.update: update TB_COMMENT set content=#{content} where cno=#{cno}
